title: Aerial Huntress
description: The player becomes an apprentice to a legendary aerial huntress, learning to tame and ride mythical creatures while protecting the realm from airborne threats.
subquest: Traverse treacherous mountains to rescue a trapped baby dragon.
Master the art of aerial combat against dangerous wyverns.
Discover the hidden lair of a rogue phoenix and restore peace.
Compete in a thrilling aerial race against skilled huntresses.
Protect the realm from a massive aerial invasion led by a powerful sorcerer.
